first_para: Justin Paul Tomlinson (born 5 November 1976) is a Conservative MP for North Swindon. He was originally a Conservative Councillor on Swindon Borough Council, being elected in 2000.

full.extract:
Justin Paul Tomlinson (born 5 November 1976) is a Conservative MP for North Swindon. He was originally a Conservative Councillor on Swindon Borough Council, being elected in 2000.
^ "Justin Tomlinson MP". BBC Democracy Live. BBC. Retrieved 25 July 2010. 
^ The London Gazette: List of members returned to serve in parliament at the general election 2010 Retrieved 11 June 2014
full.title: Justin Tomlinson
